titleInfo.title: [Lottery proposal] 1810 Jan. 03, Knoxville / East Tennessee College

mods.abstract: This document is a lottery proposal written on January 3, 1810 to benefit East Tennessee College. The proposal specifies how much and in what manner the money will be given out to the winners and what percentage would be retained by the college. The funds gained through the lottery for the College will benefit the Seminary of Education. The document concludes by giving incentives to the public as to why they should participate in the lottery, such as the fact that it will benefit and education the students of the present, as well as the future.
